caption:
🚀 Excited to announce we've secured the game-changing Zed2i component for our rover! 

This crucial addition is set to elevate our performance at the European Rover Challenge. We extend our heartfelt gratitude to Alfa Green Recycling LLP for their generous camera sponsorship. 

Let's make history at #ERC2024! 🌌🔧 #RoadToERC #RoverReady #InnovationInAction

WE'RE BACK! 🎉 APL Season 2 is here and we're kicking it off in style! 🏏🔥 

Our 2nd cricket tournament was an unforgettable day of thrills, spills, and camaraderie! 🤩 
From the crack of the bat🏏 to the cheer of the crowd🎉, every moment was pure magic!✨ 

Reliving the excitement with our fantastic members, seniors, and super seniors was the icing on the cake. 🎓

We laughed, we cheered, and we made memories that will last a lifetime. 🥳

 #CricketFever #TeamBonding #MemoriesForLife #SportsmanSpirit #TeammatesForLife

We are absolutely thrilled to announce the results of the recruitment for DJS Antariksh - our official Martian rover team - for the year 2024-25. The response we received from passionate FEs who are ready to pioneer the frontiers of space technology and embark on an extraordinary journey of innovation was truly overwhelming.

A hearty congratulations to all the selected candidates who successfully navigated the rigorous selection process. Your dedication, enthusiasm, and vision promise to infuse our team with fresh perspectives and groundbreaking ideas. We eagerly anticipate witnessing the incredible feats you'll accomplish in the year ahead. 😍

To those who, despite their immense talent and drive, couldn't join us this time, we extend our heartfelt encouragement. Remember, this is just one step on your journey of exploration. Keep pushing boundaries, keep dreaming, and keep reaching for the stars. Your passion for space technology is commendable, and we wish you the very best for all your future endeavors. 💯

Welcome to the family, dear new members! Together, let's script a new chapter in the story of space exploration. 🚀🌌

#erc2024 #todecipherunimaginable

Embrace the unknown, and let curiosity guide your path." 🌌

🚀 DJS Antariksh Official Martian Rover Team invites you to embark on an extraordinary journey beyond Earth's boundaries. Our team is more than just a collective of individuals; we are pioneers, dreamers, and visionaries united by our passion for space exploration. As we set our sights on the red planet, we're searching for bold individuals ready to push the limits of what's possible.💯

Joining our team means becoming part of a legacy—a legacy of innovation, discovery, and perseverance. Whether you're a budding engineer, a keen programmer, or a space enthusiast with a thirst for knowledge, there's a place for you on our team. As we prepare to send our rover to navigate the Martian terrain, we're seeking diverse talents and perspectives to ensure our mission's success.✨

Apply to be a part of this exhilarating journey and leave your mark on the future of space exploration. Together, we'll push boundaries, defy expectations, and inspire future generations to reach for the stars. Don't let this opportunity slip away—check recruitment details and take the first step towards joining the adventure! 

All the essential pre-requisites AND important notes for the interviews will be provided in the forms itself.
There are a number of departments you can apply for. They are listed as follows:
❖ Coding
❖ Electronics
❖ Science
❖ Marketing
❖ Mechanical
So pen down your resumes and prepare yourselves for the interviews because you sure don’t want to miss out!! We hope to see all of you in LARGE NUMBERS!🥵🙌🏽

#todecipherunimaginable #rover #martianrover #teamwork #space #erc2024 #spaceroboticssociety

🌌 Inspired by the timeless wisdom of Carl Sagan, who famously said, 'Exploration is in our DNA; we are wanderers at heart.' 

💫 Our hearts swell with pride and exhilaration as we reminisce about the official unveiling of DJS Antariksh, a pivotal moment where our countless hours of effort, design, and development came to the forefront. The team's rovers, Prayaan and Abhyaan, were displayed in front of the entire college, symbolizing our origin and bright future. It was a moment of pure magic as we unveiled our rover to the entire college community, igniting waves of awe and admiration.

🚀 We owe boundless gratitude to everyone who made this dream a reality - our esteemed faculty advisors, the visionary college administration, and our tireless team members who poured their souls into this project. And to all who graced the unveiling with their presence, your unwavering support fuels our journey to craft a rover that will captivate the world.

🌠 As we gaze towards the stars, our spirits soar with determination to push the boundaries of innovation and chart new frontiers. Our mission? To forge a rover that will proudly represent DJSCE on the global stage, inspiring generations of future space explorers.

🛰 Stay tuned as we embark on this exhilarating odyssey, unlocking the mysteries of space technology one innovation at a time. Together, let's blaze a trail of discovery and redefine the essence of exploration. 

#todecipherunimaginable #rover #martianrover #teamwork #space #erc2024 #spaceroboticssociety

🌟 Greetings from DJS Antariksh! 

🚀 Don't miss out on the final call for the unveiling of our college's very own Martian Rover, ABHYAAN!

 ✨ We're excited to welcome you to witness ABHYAAN and Udayaan up close! 🔥

🧨 Be sure to attend and check out the QR to enter our Official Giveaway! 🎁 

 #MartianRoverUnveiling #ABHYAAN #Udayaan #GiveawayAlert

The moment we've all been waiting for has finally arrived!🥳 We are thrilled to announce the fruition of countless hours of dedication, innovation, and anticipation as we proudly unveil our award winning rover and drone, ABHYAAN & UDAYAAN🤖🚀
With our rover and drone, we're not merely charting new territories—we're redefining the very notion of exploration itself. They're the embodiment of our relentless pursuit of knowledge, our unwavering commitment to pushing boundaries, and our boundless curiosity.🌠

Join us on March 16th as we commemorate this remarkable engineering achievement and the essence of ingenuity.🎉This marks the inception of our expedition into exploring the untapped realms and delving into the boundless mysteries of the universe.🔭

We're privileged to extend this invitation to all those who've contributed to our journey, and we eagerly anticipate the extraordinary paths our curiosity and innovation will lead us towards in the future.🌌

#MartianRover #todecipherunimaginable #unveiling #unveilingofabhyaan&udayaan

Ready to conquer the red planet! 🪐 
DJS Antariksh is thrilled to unveil our
martian rover, Abhyaan 🚀 and space drone, Udayaan 🌌 in front of our college for the first time. We can’t wait to take on the challenges of Martian exploration with our innovative technology and teamwork. Join us on 16th March and stay tuned for updates!!
#ToDecipherUnimaginable #MartianRover #EngineeringExcellence #RedPlanetBound #FutureOfSpaceExploration
#Innovation #Teamwork 
#Abhyaan #Udayaan #erc2024

🚀 Exciting Announcement for the students at DJ Sanghvi 🌟
 
We’re thrilled to introduce you to an exhilarating event that you wouldn’t want to miss!
 
🔴 Introducing DJS Antariksh’s Martian Rover and Space Drone Unveiling! 🔴
 
Join us as we unveil our award-winning Martian Rover, Abhyaan and our very first prodigy space drone, Udayaan on the 16th of March, held on the Ground Floor Lobby at 12:30pm!!🌌🔭
Be prepared to be amazed by the ingenuity of our team and the marvels of technology as we take you on a virtual journey to the Red Planet!
 
But that’s not all! 🎉 To make things even more exciting, we’ve prepared a special surprise for you! 🎁 Participate in a fun quiz about DJS Antariksh, the link to which is sent to the Whatsapp Groups AND the QR codes on the posters across the college building. Test your knowledge about our team and stand a chance to win exciting giveaways and prizes! 🏆💫 #erc2024 #unveiling #abhyaan #udayaan #mars #spacedrone #marsrover #teamwork #todecipherunimaginable

DJS Antariksh is delighted to announce @solidworks as our Official CAD Partner! We are highly grateful for their constant support in our journey! 💯🎉

Solidworks offers a brilliant 3D CAD design software which is incredibly helpful for our team's rover!

#todecipherunimaginable #marsrover #team #space #robotics #partnership

DJS Antariksh is thrilled to announce @ansys_inc as our Official Partner!
We are grateful for their continuous help and support, helping us uplift this team and create positive change together! 

Ansys provides an amazing CAE/multiphysics engineering simulation software for product design, testing and operations!

#todecipherunimaginable #marsrover #team #space #robotics #partnership
